item.title: Simple Microservice With Open Feign
item.description: 1. Overview In this tutorial we’re going to describe how to use open feign on spring boot. Open Feign is a REST Client that is useful for service to service communication as a microservice. 2. Dependencies first create a spring boot project and add this library to your build.gradle. compile group: 'io.github.openfeign', name: 'feign-core', version: '10.10.1' compile group: 'com.netflix.feign', name: 'feign-gson', version: '8.14.3' 3. Feign Client Create an interface class first, this class is intended as a client who will request data via REST Api to other services / applications.
